channel.title: Character file
channel.description:
I seem to be failing at adding a new int into the char file. It works like playerRights (character-rights) and is called playerRank (character-rank)
How do I make it save this to the char file?

item.title: Character file
item.dc:creator: @_BBLLAARRGGHH __--BBLLAARRGGHH--__
item.description:
@_BBLLAARRGGHH wrote:

Which class is this in?

Read full topic

item.title: Character file
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Look in your savePlayer (Or whatever) method and make it make a new variable in the player file. Then make this playerFile variable equal your ‘int’ (:P) Now in playerLoad add it to make ‘int’ equal that variable. Oh yeah, use bufferReader/Writer.

Read full topic
